title: How to Simplify DevOps using Docker
headline: Become a DevOps expert by building and deploying web applications using Docker with this free online course.
description: Are you a DevOps professional who wants to level up your skills or somebody planning to start your career in DevOps? Not having Docker on your resume will hinder your abilities and career growth. Here is your chance to stay ahead of the curve. This course is not just a course but a practical learning experience designed to make any beginner a Docker expert in a matter of hours. Join this exciting journey now.
courseDescription:
Docker is used every day by dozens of large corporations. But the great thing about it is that it works remarkably well, even for small projects. Learning Docker and general DevOps skills are gaining massive traction as companies are now expecting new developers to handle the complete life cycle of their web applications. That means both developing and deploying the apps. It has resulted in numerous job and career opportunities, a significant gap between demand and qualified professionals and a promising future.

This course is a perfect balance between theory and practical material. You are not only going to gain heaps of knowledge about Docker but will also learn valuable DevOps skills. We have structured the course into various modules and topics to show what you can build with Docker and how to do it. It begins with teaching you its fundamentals, guiding you through developing and deploying a multi-service Flask and Ruby on Rails application. You won't need Flask or Ruby on Rails experience to understand this course as you can follow along with Windows, macOS X or Linux. You will have a fully functional and secure web app with fully automated deployment and understand how it works by the end of the course.

Now is your chance to learn how to use Docker and make a career out of it by deploying a web application in an automated manner. Alternatively, you can save money by self-hosting your web apps by improving your DevOps skills. This course provides enough experience to help you start applying for jobs in the DevOps field or set up a deployment strategy for your brand new start-up. So get ready to level up and join the course for an exciting journey where you will go from Docker novice to DevOps expert in just a few hours.

Start Course Now
